On the NFS Client Configuration screen select Add (Alt+a). Enter the following:
step.screen: NFS Server: 192.168.200.10 Remote Directory: /export/glance NFSv4 Share: (checked) pNFS: (unchecked) Mount Point (local): /var/lib/glance/images Options: defaults

step.para: Select OK (Alt+o) to apply the changes. If prompted that packages need to be installed, select Install (Alt+i).

section.title: Update the Model to Enable LVM Storage with Cinder
section.para: In this section, update the model to enable LVM+iSCSI shared storage for cinder.

procedure.title: Select the Correct Network Interface Models for NFS Shared Storage

step.para: On the seventh screen (Review configuration files), select the Model tab.
On the Model tab select Disks (1TB Controller). The file should be opened for editing.
Add the following to the end of the file (the section begins indented 2 spaces):
step.screen: device-groups: - name: cinder-volumes devices: - name: /dev/sdb consumer: name: cinder

step.para: Click Save and close the editor.
